bio.zh: 專業的 Logo 和品牌設計師，擁有 5 年設計經驗，曾服務過多家知名企業。
bio.en: Professional Logo and brand designer with 5 years of experience, served many well-known companies.

bio.zh: 專業商業攝影師，專精於產品攝影和人像攝影，作品曾獲多項攝影獎項。
bio.en: Professional commercial photographer specializing in product and portrait photography, award-winning works.

bio.zh: 自由插畫家，專長數位插畫和角色設計，風格多變，深受客戶喜愛。
bio.en: Freelance illustrator specializing in digital illustration and character design, versatile style loved by clients.
